>
[Advanced Devotion](/Feats.aspx?ID=690) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 223 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Champion](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=4)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Devotion](/Feats.aspx?ID=687)

</column>

---

You gain one [champion feat](/Classes.aspx?ID=4/feats). For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your champion level is equal to half your character level.

**Special** You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another champion feat.
